title: CHANCE Program | University of Illinois at Chicago
text: Our Story Continues (16) Years Later………… We are still committed to “Opening Doors and Changing Lives!”
The UIC CHANCE Program was designed to assist the University of Illinois at Chicago with its goal to increase recruitment, retention and graduation rates of underrepresented students.
COMMUNITY ALERT: Attention Scholars and Visitors:

Whereas, our university is dealing with the COVID-19 Pandemic  the CHANCE Program is still in operation within our Virtual Campus format. Please join us online via the Blackboard Learn Portal or if you need personal, professional or academic assistance please contact us at: 312-355-5025 or email chance@uic.edu.
Attention Parents and Guardians who are interested in our Summer Camp Opportunities. NOTE: Due to COVID-19 Pandemic our application deadline has been extended to  Friday, May 15th.
For more information and applications details: Visit Early Outreach Initiatives TAB…..

Due to the onset of our COVID-19 Pandemic we are unable to bring our 2020 Summer Campers ON CAMPUS between June – August 2020. We are currently moving our “on-campus” SUMMER PROGRAMMING ONLINE using the following virtual platforms: Blackboard Learn, Google Hang-Outs, Webex and Zoom Videoconferencing.
Our Camp Directors will contact applicants (very soon) with more information regarding this method of instruction.
